feed.title: LF-Air
feed.subtitle: RSS feed based on RSS and LLM.

entry.title: Vite report on Wed, 16 Aug 2023 22:01:23
entry.summary:
Tech:
- A Vietnamese electric carmaker is now worth $85 billion, which is almost as much as Ford and General Motors combined.
- There's an oversupply of electric vehicles (EVs) versus gas cars at dealerships, solving two of the biggest problems with car shopping.
- Amazon Pharmacy automates discounts to help insulin patients get pledged prices.
- Meet JEN-1, a universal AI framework that combines bi-directional and uni-directional modes to generate high-quality music conditioned on either text or music representations.
- Meet Marqo, an open-source vector search engine for AI applications.
- ASP.NET Core in .NET 8 Preview 7 introduces features like Blazor, Native AOT, Antiforgery, and more.
- Build an expandable/collapsible data table with 2 shadcn/ui components.
- Demystifying "No 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin' Header" in JavaScript and Postman: A comprehensive exploration.
- The Best Serverless Framework in 2023: A data-driven showdown for AWS projects.
- The Download: Tech's ethical congregation and the Inflation Reduction Act's anniversary.

Business:
- The owner of a luxury retailer in San Francisco says that rising crime and homelessness could make this year its last after 162 years of business.
- Police in Ireland had to guard ATMs after a glitch at the country's biggest bank allowed some people to withdraw over $1,000 of cash they didn't have.
- SEC amps up breach disclosure requirements, focusing on how to support the board of directors.
- The White House's efforts to combat climate change have sparked a tech arms race with the EU.
- Target sales fell for the first time in 6 years, but the retailer's stock is surging.

AI:
- Tesla's 'ultra hardcore' work culture, as told by its employees.
- Meet JEN-1, a universal AI framework that combines bi-directional and uni-directional modes to generate high-quality music conditioned on either text or music representations.
- Meet Marqo, an open-source vector search engine for AI applications.

Other:
- Ukraine is angered by a NATO official's suggestion that it could 'give up territory' to Russia and get NATO membership in return.
- The S&P 500 is massively overvalued and likely to plunge like it did last year, according to top economist David Rosenberg.
- The captain of a Boeing 787 Dreamliner died mid-air after becoming unwell, according to reports.
- How do we save water? Stop growing alfalfa in Imperial County.
- Netflix's 'Scott Pilgrim Takes Off' anime debuts teaser trailer and premiere date.
- Baldur's Gate 3's Steam Cloud Save Syncing is killing internet connections.
- 12 games you really need to play if you love 'Baldur's Gate 3'.
- Cybersecurity as a strategic investment: How ROI optimization can lead to a more secure future.
- Lithium Iron Phosphate is set to be the next big thing in EV batteries.
- From vulnerability to resilience: A guide to cybersecurity in the manufacturing sector.
- Honey Pepper Pimento Chicken: How to get Chick-fil-A's first new sandwich in years.
- In a tipster's note, a view of science publishing's Achilles heel.
